Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mercure San Sebastian Monte Igueldo in San Sebastian, you'll be near the bay and minutes from Monte Igeldo and close to Monte Urgull. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Peine de los Vientos and Ondarreta Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 125 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a terrace. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in San Sebastian? This hotel has 9641 square feet (896 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Monte Igeldo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
El Peine de los Vientos - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ondarreta Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Palacio de Miramar - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Donostia-San Sebastian Aquarium - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Naval Museum - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Monte Urgull - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Castillo de la Mota - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Concha Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
San Sebastian City Hall - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Plaza de La Constitucion - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
San Telmo Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
San Vicente Church - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Plaza Del Buen Pastor - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Good Shepherd Cathedral of San Sebastian - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure San Sebastian Monte Igueldo is San Sebastian (EAS) - 18.1 km / 11.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
